Adam worked at Business & Decision North America

AbilityCRM is a Gold Certified Microsoft Dynamics CRM and a Certified Sage SalesLogix CRM business partner. We help companies use CRM software to improve their business. Our expertise is in: 1.) Adoption of CRM as a business tool; 2.) Integration of CRM with ERP / Accounting systems; 3.) Management of data using dashboards and business intelligence tools. Our major industry verticals are Manufacturing, Finance, Construction, and Hospitality with clients all over the United States. We have a full service consulting staff to provide CRM business process consulting, installation, implementation, a CRM help desk, and CRM training both on-site or over the web. ClickDimensions Certified Marketing Director -*Create and implement a lead generation process*Develop targeted marketing campaigns*Create and develop newsletters, webinars, and documents to drive company visibility
